topic.para: If the keep-hostname() option is enabled (keep-hostname(yes)), the value of the $HOST macro will be the hostname retrieved from the log message. That way the name of the original sender host can be used, even if there are log relays between the sender and the server.
Also note that setting the options use-fqdn(), use-dns(), normalize-hostnames(), and dns-cache() to enabled will have no effect if keep-hostname() is enabled.
